label.English: Which ID card do you have?

জন্ম নিবন্ধন সনদপত্রের সরকারী নম্বর যেভাবে দেওয়া আছে সেভাবেই ইনপুট দিন।

label.English: Do you know your Date of Birth?
Date of birth of the member

hint.English: Invalid data entered

label.English: Do you know your lmp, EDD or last Ultrasound information?

children.name: child_vaccines
children.choice_filter:
(name = 'bcg' ) or 
(name = 'opv0' ) or 
(name = 'penta1' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 35 ) or 
(name = 'pcv1' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 35 ) or 
(name = 'opv1' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 35 ) or 
(name = 'penta2' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 63 ) or 
(name = 'pcv2' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 63 ) or 
(name = 'opv2' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 63 ) or 
(name = 'penta3' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 91 ) or 
(name = 'pcv3' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 91 ) or 
(name = 'opv3' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 91 ) or 
(name = 'ipv' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 91 ) or 
(name = 'measles1' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 250 ) or 
(name = 'measles2' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 340 )

label.Bengali: পূর্বে যেসব টীকা শিশুকে দেওয়া হয়েছে-

hint.Bengali: টিকার তারিখ অবশ্যই জন্মতারিখের পর এবং রেজিস্ট্রেশনের আগে হবে
hint.English: The date of vaccination must be after child's birthdate and before registration date

children.name: child_vaccines_2
children.choice_filter:
(name = 'bcg' and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'bcg'))) or 
(name = 'opv0' and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'opv0'))) or 
(name = 'penta1' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 35 and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'penta1'))) or 
(name = 'pcv1' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 35 and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'pcv1'))) or 
(name = 'opv1' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 35 and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'opv1'))) or 
(name = 'penta2' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 63 and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'penta2'))) or 
(name = 'pcv2' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 63 and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'pcv2'))) or 
(name = 'opv2' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 63 and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'opv2'))) or 
(name = 'penta3' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 91 and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'penta3'))) or 
(name = 'pcv3' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 91 and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'pcv3'))) or 
(name = 'opv3' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 91 and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'opv3'))) or 
(name = 'ipv' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 91 and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'ipv'))) or 
(name = 'measles1' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 250 and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'measles1'))) or 
(name = 'measles2' and number(${Child_age_days}) > 340 and not(selected(${child_vaccines}, 'measles2')))
